Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, north of Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive intersects with Nagaritha Drive to the south. On the western side of the road, you can see the Chateau Richland Grape Orchard and a path leading to a grove of trees in the fields. On the east you can see and hear the crowd in the Melbourne Arena where thieves and pick- pockets are thrown to the gladiators.
